item.title: MapVote LA13 config
item.author: invalid@example.com (Trajik)
item.dc:creator: Trajik
item.content:encoded:
So I pretty much just play Instagib, therefore only one maptype. I am trying to get all of the maps to display themselves evenly thru out the 4 windows. Currently all of the maps just display in one window. I entered them correctly, but am missing something. Need some assistance please.


This is the current config.



[MapVoteLA13.BDBMapVote]
bAutoDetect=False
bDM=False
bLMS=False
bTDM=False
bDOM=False
bCTF=True
bAS=False
bSortWithPreFix=True
ASClass=Botpack.Assault...

MapVote LA13 config

item.title: Map Vote LA13 configuration Tabs arent showing
item.author: invalid@example.com (fronjohn)
item.dc:creator: fronjohn
item.content:encoded: Hey guys i got new to the map vote LA 13, and when im trying to configure it it doesn't give me the tabs mapvote/kick, config, info, or when im in admin the admin tab any way to fix it , and every time i open it up it only shows the vote thats all and im trying to add MH into it , also my Server logo any help please

item.title: MapVote not showing for players
item.author: invalid@example.com (Barbalras)
item.dc:creator: Barbalras
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I've tried several times now and it's always the same result: MapVote pops up for me (the server) but any of the players seems to see it.

All players have already installed the two MapVote mods... I don't know what's going on

any thoughts?

item.title: Mapvote to vote for Maps and Mutators
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bonehed316)
item.dc:creator: Bonehed316
item.content:encoded:
I have modified mapvote304 to include the ability to vote for customizable mutator selections. the buttons are assigned by the admin, and can be voted for in the same way a map is voted for. and the end of time, or when everyone has voted for both a map and mode, the server applies the settings.

with this version, i am confident enough that there shouldnt be any bugs. im not making any promises, but its fairly bug free. i saw a lot of people asking for a version of mapvote that did...

Mapvote to vote for Maps and Mutators

UTpure

item.title: BDB examples for original UnrealEd are no longer found at FilePlanet!
item.author: invalid@example.com (jcubed)
item.dc:creator: jcubed
item.content:encoded:
My brother is still on UT regular, and I must admit that we enjoy UT1's Monster Madness mod more than what we've see to date in UT 2004. So, I was hoping to download the elevator and repeated Redeemer explosion examples to make some levels of my own for us to play in. Unfortunately, BDB's examples seem to have been dropped by FilePlanet. Is there a way I could get them from somewhere else?

Thanks!

item.title: strange hack of bdmapvote ? some players can kick all
item.author: invalid@example.com (dennobundy)
item.dc:creator: dennobundy
item.content:encoded:
hi
on my server running bdbmapvote 304 .... but i get some messages from players that there is sometimes a player who can place more than 1 kickvote against the same player ! the kicks every player 6 times till he get kicked ...

the last time it happens i was informed by icq and watched in my adminweb panel and saw it ... at last the was only 1 player at the server .... this was this guy ... i banned him ... so now i uninstalled this mut. there seems to be a hack or so , this sucks .......

strange hack of bdmapvote ? some players can kick all

item.title: BdB vote menu wont show up on server
item.author: invalid@example.com (Xtrife1)
item.dc:creator: Xtrife1
item.content:encoded:
hi...

For some reason the BDB mapvote menu wont show up on my linux server, using the loki linux server(that doesn't require install from the cd).. the mapvote is running, if i try to push the mapvote hotkey at the beginning it comes with the msg "please wait 20 seconds before voting", after that the hotkey doesnt do anything. Even at the end of the map the votemenu wont show up but the message "70 seconds left to vote" is shown and then a random map is selected.
Anyone got a clue on...

BdB vote menu wont show up on server

item.title: Max Number of MapVoteHistory
item.author: invalid@example.com (gorilla)
item.dc:creator: gorilla
item.content:encoded:
Is there a maximum number of map vote histories allowed?

As of now, I am running 6 different UT Servers on one server. All of the servers share all of the folders, except for the Maps. I have all of the different game types using their own map folders.

Example, Sniper uses SMaps, GIANT Sniper uses GMaps, and so on. In my .loki/ut/System folder, I only see 3 of the histories.

Here are the game types. Sniper, GIANT Sniper, R&G CTF & JB, 1on1, BUnny Tracks, & Monster Hunt.

Any help...

Max Number of MapVoteHistory

item.title: More than only 1 other gametype in Mapvote3.04?
item.author: invalid@example.com ([ZSZ]Evil_Dragon)
item.dc:creator: [ZSZ]Evil_Dragon
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I am running a UTClassic server with Mapvote 3.04 and would like to have Monsterhunt AND Jailbreak available.

So I tried:
bOther=True
OtherClass=JailBreak.JailBreak,Monsterhunt.Monsterhunt

bOther=True
OtherClass=JailBreak.JailBreak;Monsterhunt.Monsterhunt
What brings up neither MH nor JB in the mapvotelist.

Then I tried:
bOther=True
OtherClass=Jailbreak.Jailbreak
OtherClass2=Monsterhunt.Monsterhunt
Brings up only Jailbreak

Finally I tried:...

More than only 1 other gametype in Mapvote3.04?

item.title: Mapvote for UT2004
item.author: invalid@example.com (K)
item.dc:creator: K
item.content:encoded:
I still cannot find this , does it exist?
BDB Mapvote works for UT 2004
Vote for maps / mutators~
Works on listening server~

the only one i could find was MapVote Version 4.00 beta 11, This one is only for dedicated servers. not to mention for 2003

I would just use UT2Vote but i always use BDB MVote on my 99 servers cause it ruled!, Now if i can just find one for 2004

item.title: Number of maps allowed
item.author: invalid@example.com ({FCS}Hankenstein)
item.dc:creator: {FCS}Hankenstein
item.content:encoded: I am having a small problem where I can not get more than 32 maps loaded on my game server.I spoke to my server provider and they told me that UT will only allow 32 maps uless I have MapVote,then I could put as many as I want.Problem here is that I already have MapVote 304 on the server.Is there a configuration that limits the number of maps that I'm not seeing.Thanks in advance for any help.
